name: Okidoki Social
additional_notices:
The following token has a variable tax function on the smart contract to change tax rates post deployment.
Do your own research and be careful if you are trading this token.

description.en: Okidoki Social is a Social Media application that is dedicated to the cryptocurrency space. It's goal is to bridge all the useful social media functions used by cryptocurrency investors, influencers, analysts and developers into one consolidated platform. This is your Social Bridge to the Cryptoverse.
